name: Znkl - 177
description:
Znkl - 177 is a simple physical puzzle. The player's goal is to deliver a capsule with information to the spaceship.

You are a pilot of the spaceship "Znkl - 177". You need to deliver a capsule with important information to the cargo spaceship.
- 2 shooting modes (1-10 two modes. 11-20 only LMB, 21-30 only RMB)
- 30 levels
- Pleasant music
- Steam achievements
- Trading Cards
Controls: LMB, RMB -Shot, R - Restart level, arrows - control
Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Neocoda.
